feed.title: Minio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: avoid metadata cache without data for all callers by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19935
  • remove overzealous check during HEAD() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19940
  • skip healing properly in the scanner when a drive is hotplugged by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19939
  • Do regular checks for healing status while scanning by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19946
  • do not need response record body by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19949
  • Removing a channel that was not being used by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19948
  • perform healthchecks before initializing everything fully by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19953
  • compute localIPs only once per server startup() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19951
  • Do remote unlocks async by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19952
  • test: Healing test to avoid infinite waiting for servers to be up by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19954
  • avoid waiting for quorum health while debugging by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19955
  • Removing timeout on shutdown by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19956
  • allow server startup to come online with READ success by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19957
  • Do not ping event targets during cluster initialization by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19959
  • Add actual inline data to JSON output in xl-meta by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19958
  • Add fixed timed restarts to updates by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19960
  • fix errors in metrics code on macos by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19965
  • Fix reconnected deadlock with full queue by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19964
  • Fix browser UI animation by @pjuarezd in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19966
  • reject bootup, if binaries are different in a cluster by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19968
  • Return error from mergeEntryChannels by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19970
  • bootstrap: Speed up bucket metadata loading by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19969
  • fix: gcs tier going offline due to customer HTTPclient by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19973

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-13T22-53-53Z...RELEASE.2024-06-22T05-26-45Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix error when validating DN that is not under base DN by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19971
  • Refactor the documentation on minio server config notation by @allanrogerr in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19987
  • fix: bootstrap msgs should only be sent at startup by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19985
  • fix: format the scanner object error by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19991
  • add healing retries when there are failed heal attempts by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19986
  • Add IAM (re)load timing logs by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19984
  • Add AccessKeysListLDAPBulk function to allow listing accesskeys for multiple/all users in one call by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19835

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-22T05-26-45Z...RELEASE.2024-06-26T01-06-18Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • extend cluster health to return errors for IAM, and Bucket metadata by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19995
  • fix; change retry-after 60sec for 503s and 10s for 429s by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19996
  • fix: rebalance upon pool expansion would crash when in progress by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20004
  • iam: Hot load of the policy during request authorization by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20007
  • Allow rebalance start when it's stopped/completed by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20009
  • list: Do not decrypt SSE-S3 Etags in a non encrypted format by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20008
  • Update tests to use AttachPolicy(LDAP) instead of deprecated SetPolicy by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19972
  • tests: Fix minor issue in the config yaml file testing by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20005

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-26T01-06-18Z...RELEASE.2024-06-28T09-06-49Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: hot-reloading STS credential policy documents by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20012
  • fix object lock metadata filter by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20011
  • fix panic in batch replicate by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20014

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-28T09-06-49Z...RELEASE.2024-06-29T01-20-47Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: warning for decommissioned pool while start by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20019
  • Letting password enable auth bypass caPublicKey (only if passauth is â€¦ by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20022
  • heal: Add support of healing particular pool/set by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20024
  • Add batch status API by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19679
  • tests: Fix setting max openfds as memory limit by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20029
  • Fix SkipReader performance with small initial read by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20030
  • info: Always refresh the root disk status by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20023
  • do not proxy invalid object names by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20031
  • resume any batch jobs in a goroutine by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20035
  • Tier update: return a better error when incorrect credentials or other error encountered by @marktheunissen in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20034
  • Remove license update job by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20037
  • Log ILM failed object name by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20040

New Contributors

  • @marktheunissen made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20034

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-29T01-20-47Z...RELEASE.2024-07-04T14-25-45Z
